text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump "...Dr. Anthony Fauci warned on ABC's “Good Morning America” Wednesday that “you still should be wearing a mask and “avoid congregating in large numbers,” Trump the same day announced he would resume his signature mega rallies ..."
https://t.co/AjtGJ0wUFe

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Good Morning America
entity.description: Co-anchors report the morning's top headlines from a set in Times Square. The show features a combination of breaking news, interviews, in-depth reporting and weather. The program covers important issues with key figures from around the world and a wide spectrum of topics, including medicine, finance, consumer issues, computer technology, education and gardening.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
